name: ABOBO
description:
This game was made for the GMTK 2021 game jam.

In this strategy-puzzle game, defeat the dark forces of an evil witch to guide your banished souls into a peaceful afterlife.

All spirits must move as one.

I will push them gently, to guide them through the realms of the dead.

Beware, for Mawu the Witch's grudges will attempt to stop us all, out of jealousy and envy; for their existence is hollow.

All spirits can resonate together through shared emotions - that they remember from their earthly existence. Use them to banish the witch's wayward creatures.

Banish them all to move on to the next realm.

Depending on the realms, you'll need to adapt to the emotions available to your spirits.

Your spirits are soul fragments, deliquescent remains of their past splendor. But they can fuse, and in fusing, remember more of their past lives, and become stronger against the witch's dark forces.

May Samedi smile upon us.

ABOBO!

Controls

Use the arrow keys to move your spirits.

Click on the memory cards on the left to activate available emotions, whenever your spirits are in the appropriate pattern.

If a spirit would move into the same spot as another of the same level, they will fuse and level up.
